summary: When his journal of bright ideas is stolen, college freshman Bickford Schmeckler (Fugit) has to blanket the campus in order to locate it.

Walsh|Gary Lundy|Reid Scott|Genevieve Padalecki|Danny Kanamori|Robert Ben Garant|Thomas Lennon|Matthew Lillard|Wes Ramsey|John Cho|Greg Pitts|Simon Helberg|Mageina Tovah|J.B. Ghuman Jr.|Cheryl Hines|Natalie Garza|Nicole Garza|Laurie Boloven|Veronique Vicari|Tiffany Dupont|Amy Kowallis|Daniel Lew|Clark Gregg|Will Burke|Julie Welch|Susan Paley|Keira Glynn|Tony Klein|Mycole Metcalf
title: Superfrikis
